output_data.summary: Follow-up session focused on escalating symptoms of Major Depressive Disorder (MDD) including passive suicidal ideation, resulting in the titration of Sertraline.
output_data.reasoning: This is a structured follow-up appointment assessing the patient's suboptimal response to 4 weeks of Sertraline 50mg. The discussion covers core depressive symptoms (anhedonia, guilt, sleep/appetite disturbance) and includes an essential safety assessment regarding passive suicidal ideation. The primary clinical decision is the pharmacological adjustment of the antidepressant dose.
